name: Bobbie Griffin
text: The Lights have been off 6 hours now 😡

name: Jacob Duffee
text: Don't really do reviews but I can say anytime I've needed something they have always helped

name: Jackie Jones
text: New street light bulbs are awful.  They don't give out enough light to go from one light post to the next without being in the dark.  Evidently people safety isn't as important as saving dollars.  Disservice to citizens of Opelika.

name: James Joyce
text: $65 pure-profit "new connection fee" to change a name in the computer. Power has already been connected and running for years. Unbelievable. Even Alabama Power, the evil empire, is cheaper.

name: OK BOOMER
text: so many power outages!! Oh no it's raining... Guess I didn't need power anyways

name: Gid Alston
text: I can't understand the complaints. We've been with Opelika Power for seven years and have had only positive experiences. We have the entire bundle (TV, DVR, Wifi, internet, etc.) and everything works perfectly.

name: Stephen Herren
text: Fast reliable internet at a reasonable price.  Very friendly and knowledgeable customer service as well.  I don't have Phone or TV, so I can't comment on those.

name: Harry A
text: Trying to get fiber is more of a hassle than dealing with Charter (due to always being referred to one woman in OPS office who is a real b|tch) so I continue to recommend cable internet for businesses clients. I can't be the only one who has experienced similar issues, so maybe that's why they are losing money....

name: Erica Wilson
text: I absolutely hate ops. I've never experience anything like them. They beat you out of every dime you have and coustmer service is so poor. They will turn you off for $5.00. Never in my life! People's company my ass they act more like Loan sharks!

name: Coco Brown
text: Lieing managers told me I didn’t pay a deposit. I know I did and didn’t receive it back that’s why there internet and cable company is going in the toilet

name: Dewel Knowles
text: They have a horrible system for billing and poor attitude with people....their customers! We got a delinquent notice for 10 dollars unpaid. My account is set up on automatic payment. The 10 dollars was because we did not bring our trash can down from the street. Makes no sense

name: Kenneth Endfinger
text: Really fast. If you are an advanced network person, IPv6 is missing.

name: Chase Higgins
text: I've had a pleseant experience so far. Customer service is a little difficult to contact by phone, but the service is great and the price isn't ridiculous.

name: Tanika Welch
text: I absolutely hate it. My payment was denied @ the window (where I always pay at without a bill)  bc I didn't have my bill. Which I've never known a piece of paper to pay a bill. I thought money did!! Very poor customer service.👎🏾

name: Denna Love
text: I love the fact they have cable services

name: Samantha Bullinger
text: Internet never goes down!

name: Steven Cosgriff
text: Very poor service also the whole website is not user friendly.

name: Hailey Cooper
text:
Horrible customer service
Makes you not even want to live in Opelika dealing with them

name: Donnell Bellamy
text: Everything just badddddd 😧😧

name: Teeandfamily Jones
text: Bad customer service

name: Cynthia Martin
text: Great people! Very friendly... lots of southern charm ❤ area is nice too... locals wave at you as you drive by!

name: Jon Caldwell
text: Pays my bills...better like it here.

name: brien byerley
text: Run. Run fast and far.

name: Bretta Alless
text: LOVE this place!!!

name: Michael Smith
text: No perdium. I would not recommend.

name: Nick Erdody
text: One of the better working experiences I've ever had since being in the union and I enjoyed my time at Farley and I wish all jobs were as smooth as that one

name: Frank Padrino
text: Good people and good place to work

name: Gordon H. Fulwood
text: Home away from home

name: donald athey
text: Great place to work.

name: Dennis Altman
text: Great place to work, incredible people.

name: Zack Burdeshaw
text: A good place to work.

name: Stephen Ferguson Sr
text: Great plant to work at.

name: wayne lisenby
text: Great place to work

name: Rob Trujillo
text: Keeps the lights on,  pays the bills.

text: Very strict procedures

name: Michael Bennett
text: Farley is family

text: Just a nuclear plant

text: Very clean
